titleStmt.title: A moral treatise upon valour divided into two books / translated from the French.
Traité de morale sur la valeur. English
titleStmt.author: Cassagnes, Jacques de, 1635-1679.
Compton, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Traité de morale sur la valeur.
Attributed to Jacques Cassagnes. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
